name: mamh
description: Multi-Agent Multi-Harness (MAMH) — orchestrate teams of specialized AI agents to build complex projects autonomously with scope enforcement, review gates, and milestone-driven execution.
author: seongjinpark

skills.name: mamh
skills.description: Launch and manage multi-agent project teams with automated planning, agent provisioning, scope enforcement, and milestone-driven execution.

agents.name: mamh-orchestrator
agents.description: Team lead agent that coordinates MAMH agents in delegate mode — no direct code changes, only orchestration.

agentApprovalMode.description: Controls whether the orchestrator can create new agents at runtime. 'auto' = create without asking, 'suggest' = propose and wait for user approval, 'locked' = no new agents after Phase 1.

milestoneAdvanceMode.description: Controls what happens when a milestone completes.

reviewMode.description: Controls how completed tickets are reviewed.
